Storages¶

YAMLStorage¶

class panda_core_data.yaml_db.YAMLStorage(path)¶

Parser storage class used to read yaml files

__init__(path)¶

Open file as Data Base

Parameters

str (path) – path pointing to a yaml file

read()¶

Method used by TinyDB to read the file

static represent_doc(dumper, data)¶

Method used to transform a dict to a yaml representation

Parameters

  • dumper – yaml dumper

  • data – data to be parsed
